basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students majoring in Occupational or Industrial Safety. Eligibility Requirements Major in Occupational or Industrial Safety Minimum GPA of 3.0 Completed at least 30 hours at UCO Provide personal statement demonstrating passion for safety Demonstrate financial need Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
